'''Well-Balanced Meal''' is a [[Special Dish]] that the player has a chance to obtain by cooking [[Bulle Souffle]] with [[Sigewinne]]. The recipe for Bulle Souffle can be purchased from [[Arouet]] in [[Café Lutece]] for {{Item|Mora|x=5,000}}.
